directions: Combine black beans, diced tomatoes, okra, corn, onion powder, garlic powder, cumin, chili powder, and cayenne in a large pot. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally. Turn down to a simmer and let cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: ⅓ (16 ounce) package frozen sliced okra
title: Vegan Chili with Okra | Allrecipes
